item.title: Hillingdon Street, 14th January

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The railway underpass (arches) on Bermondsey Street, beneath the London Bridge railway viaduct is without proper lighting creating safety issue, 14th January
item.description:
The north half of the railway underpass (arches) on Bermondsey Street, beneath the London Bridge railway viaduct, when travelling from Bermondsey Street and approaching Magdalen Street, has no functioning lighting and is completely in darkness. This creates a serious safety risk, particularly for pedestrians and cyclists using the route. The issue has been ongoing for several months now despite multiples reports of the same matter
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bermondsey Street, The Borough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
